summary: This document is an email chain from October 2020 regarding notifications about the Epstein/Maxwell case and includes a forwarded message containing a serious allegation from a person named Bryan Miller. The forwarded message alleges that Ghislaine Maxwell recruited a girl for modeling who was instead sold into sexual slavery and torture, and implicates Prince Andrew as an accessory to her death.

persons.name: Wendy
persons.context: Appears to be a point of contact for Epstein/Maxwell case notifications within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email notifications and the forwarded allegation, which claims she recruited a girl for modeling who was instead sold into sexual slavery and torture.

persons.name: Bryan Miller
persons.context: Author of the forwarded email making a serious allegation about Ghislaine Maxwell, a victim, and Prince Andrew. He requests assistance in obtaining a passport to identify the victim.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Named in Bryan Miller's forwarded allegation as an accessory to the death of a victim, accused of torturing her and forcing her murder.

connections.description: Bryan Miller's email makes an allegation against Ghislaine Maxwell, claiming she recruited a victim for exploitation.
Implied connection through the forwarded allegation which mentions both in the context of the same victim's exploitation and death.
Bryan Miller's email directly accuses Prince Andrew of being an accessory to a victim's death.

events.title: Allegation Email from Bryan Miller
events.description: Bryan Miller sends an email to the US Attorney's Office alleging Ghislaine Maxwell recruited a girl for modeling who was sold into sexual slavery and torture, and that Prince Andrew was an accessory to her death.

events.title: Case Notification Update
events.description: An email indicates a personnel change on the Epstein/Maxwell case within the US Attorney's Office and forwards Bryan Miller's earlier allegation.

keyFacts: The document shows internal email coordination within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case in October 2020.
A forwarded email from Bryan Miller contains a direct and serious allegation that Ghislaine Maxwell recruited a girl for modeling who was instead sold as a 'slave for sex and torture'.
The allegation explicitly names Prince Andrew as 'an accessory to her death', accusing him of torturing the victim and forcing her murder.
Bryan Miller requests assistance in obtaining an expedited passport to identify the alleged victim mentioned in his claim.
